articles.author: Sam Marsden
articles.title: Spain toast Euro history, warn of more to come - ESPN
articles.description: Coach Luis de la Fuente celebrated Spain's historymakers and warned there is still more to come after they became the first team to win the European Championships four times by beating England 2-1 in Sunday's final at the Olympiastadion.
